title.rendered: Test Drive a Bus Day on November 18

content.rendered:
The district will host Test Drive a Bus Day on Saturday, November 18 from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. at Maple Avenue Middle School.

The family-friendly event will feature refreshments, food trucks, giveaways, bus tours, and the chance to ride or test drive a school bus. Join us to interact with our experienced school bus drivers and explore exciting opportunities within our transportation department.  SSPD will be present to provide FREE car seat checks!
